title: Hermeskeil
description: An ancient place, cited: BAtlas 11 G3 Hermeskeil

properties.description: The fortification called Hunnenring covers an area of more than 18 ha and is located on the mountain Dollberg, north of Otzenhausen, Gemeinde Nonnweiler, Saarland.
properties.title: Center point of oppidum Otzenhausen
